title: Bad Blood: Nashville Immortals Book Two
description: Reapers, werewolves, and ex-husbands… oh my!Cricket Jones’s life has been irrevocably changed since she took on a job working for vampires and discovered her own supernatural abilities. Now, her vampire boss has tasked her with investigating her close friend, Joey Morley, a lone werewolf who has developed romantic feelings for her. As if that weren’t enough, Cricket’s main squeeze, sexy Grim Reaper Zeb, is nowhere to be found and her flunky ex-husband John-Clarke has resurfaced, insinuating himself back into Cricket and her daughter’s lives while making himself a permanent fixture on her living room couch.In her quest to unravel the mystery behind the bad blood between Joey and his pack and Zeb’s disappearance, Cricket uncovers more than she bargained for—a sinister plot involving her ex-husband and some evil vampires, as well as her own buried emotions for Joey.Caught in the crosshairs of a raging alpha werewolf and a rogue vampire, can Cricket escape with both her life and her heart intact?
author: Shauna Jared
